snippet.title: SIMULAKROS - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
We team up with Sirio Games to Fight the evil CORP from the inside! Simulakros is coming this OCTOBER on PC! 👉 Play the demo NOW: https://www.simulakros.com/
🤖 Become a Simulakros 
🔫 Fast-paced third person shooter
🔁 Rogue-lite elements
✨ Futuristic world

🤖 What Simulakros is about? 
Enter a futuristic world of robots and advanced AI in Simulakros, a fast-paced third-person shooter with rogue-lite elements. The CORP seeks to develop the ultimate weapon: the Simulakros unit. It's up to you and a mysterious hacker to disrupt their plans, by turning their deadly combat androids against them. Can two people take down the world's biggest corporation?

--------

Follow us:
🧡 Twitter: https://twitter.com/DearVillagers
💜 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dearvillagers/
🧡 Discord: https://discord.gg/dearvillagers
💜 Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dearvillagers
🧡 BeReal: @dearvillagers

#fpsgames #roguelike
